attributes.action: GCSE Chemistry should be an optional subject for all schools in the U.K.
attributes.background: GCSE Chemistry should be an optional subject whilst the 2 other Sciences, Maths and English can still be not optional. Skills learnt aren't required for life and students should be entitled to more freedom.

rejection.details:
Education is now the responsibility of the Scottish Parliament, Welsh Assembly and Northern Ireland Assembly and so we cannot accept a petition on education which refers to the whole of the UK. You may wish to submit a petition on the Chemistry GCSE in English schools. 

Also, you may wish to petition the Scottish Parliament or Welsh Assembly on this matter and can find out more information here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
